title: Bug 6304: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to sync a .java file and another resource, the synchronization process fails.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully sync a .java file and another resource without any error.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Open the package viewer.  
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
